page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Primarily this area is a residential } one. Over half of the land is occupied by houses. However, there are many acres of land set aside for industry, usually in the form of Trading Estates. Chief amongst these is the {LCP Trading Estate}which was conceived in 1948 and is now one of the largest managed estates in Europe. Here, in a choice of properties,{three thousand {five hundred}people are employed, and they do a variety of work from warehousemen to{skilled craftsmen. Another important source of employment is the{Midlands Electricity Board which has a large office complex in Kingswinford. Here,{six hundred people are employed to deal with the electricity accounts for the whole Midlands area. Generally employment is fairly good.
